about_the_game:
A long time ago, AIRAN was created and sent to Earth to aid in its development. Thousands of years later, the planet is degraded and being destroyed by those she helped create. Now she must fight her greatest enemy: the human civilization. Take your seat and help her neutralize this threat!

AIRANBLADE is a 3D vertical progression action game, like the best classic shoot 'em up games, which were very popular in the 80s and 90s. Fight against squadrons of enemy aircrafts and gigantic bosses. All of this to the sound of exciting electronic music, beautiful special effects, and lots of explosions and lasers coming from all corners.

AIRANBLADE DEMO offers CARAVAN (Time Attack) mode, which can be played on three different difficulty levels.
